thread.title: Urvashi Rautela is Miss Universe India -
thread.title_full: Urvashi Rautela is Miss Universe India - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Urvashi Rautela is Miss Universe India -
text:
India has found its representative to the Miss Universe pageant, and it is none other than Mr Airavatha's lead heroine, Urvashi Rautela. Urvashi was recently crowned Miss Universe India by Kangana Ranaut at the Yamaha Fascino Miss Diva 2015 pageant in Mumbai.
While Urvashi, who is orginally from Uttarakhand, was crowned the winner, Bengaluru's Natasha Assadi was crowned the first runner-up and Aurangabad's Naveli Deshmukh the second runner-up. Urvashi will now represent India at the Miss Universe pageant.
